# airbyte_source_pokeapi (Resource)

SourcePokeapi Resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "airbyte_source_pokeapi" "my_source_pokeapi" {
  configuration = {
    pokemon_name = "snorlax"
    source_type  = "pokeapi"
  }
  name         = "Jeremiah Hahn"
  secret_id    = "...my_secret_id..."
  workspace_id = "aa2b2411-3695-4d1e-a698-fcc4596217c2"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `configuration` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--configuration))
- `name` (String)
- `workspace_id` (String)

### Optional

- `secret_id` (String) Optional secretID obtained through the public API OAuth redirect flow.

### Read-Only

- `source_id` (String)
- `source_type` (String)

<a id="nestedatt--configuration"></a>
### Nested Schema for `configuration`

Required:

- `pokemon_name` (String) Pokemon requested from the API.
- `source_type` (String) must be one of ["pokeapi"]
